text: @realDonaldTrump So you just decided today would be a good day to expose our Veterans to Coronavirus? The White House has 2 known positive cases. YOU should be in QUARANTINE FOR 2 WEEKS! Per YOUR Guidelines! https://t.co/9yhT9PrraV
